iot.agile.Device.description:
The Device API abstracts operations over the real device.
It send commands to a Protocol API instance to which is binded.

underline Protocol specific implementation.

Subscribe.description:
Enable subscription to a specific sensor or data stream, triggering
the underlying Protocol implementation if supported.

Custom parameters set to pass spcific to the device
or sensor, like eg. frequency

iot.agile.DeviceManager.description:
The DeviceManager list the registered devices available from the gateway available protocols.
This API is responsible to instantiate the reference DBus object for every device
and offer management and integration points.

A Protocol object abstract operations over a specific protocol implementation.
Every Device has one Protocol used to establish and use a communication exchange.

deviceId.description: The protocol internal reference of a device

Disconnect.description: Abstract disconnect, tear down or uninitailization process for a managed device

Read.description:
Read data over the Protocol, may be cached in the Data property
depending on implementation to save resources

iot.agile.ProtocolManager.description:
The ProtocolManager list the managed protocols in the gateway. From this
interface is possible to add and remove protocols and start/stop multiprotocol discovery.
The discovery process will list all found devices under the `Devices` property.
Those discovered devices may be added to the [DeviceManager](#iot.agile.DeviceManager) to be
configured and made operational.

StartDiscovery.description: Start discovery on all the managed Protocols

StopDiscovery.description: Stop the ongoing discovery on all the managed Protocols

protocol.description: The DBus object interface reference of the Protocol
The DBus object interface reference of the Protocol

Devices.description: Contains the list of devices returned by each Protocol specific discovery, where available

get.description: Get the list of registered protocols

post.description: Register a new Dbus object implementing the protocol API

400.description: An error occured processing the request

delete.description: Unregister a Dbus Protocol object reference

get.description: List all discovered devices on all available protocols

200.description: The list of devices found via discovery

post.description: Start a device discovery on all available protocols

204.description:
The discovery has been successfully started on all the regitered
protocols; asynchronous updates will be sent via websocket

409.description:
Indicates that discovery has been requested to the underlying
protocols but one or more reported a failure

delete.description: Stop a device discovery if previously initiated

The discovery has been successfully stopped on all the regitered
protocols; There will be no further device updates via websocket

409.description:

subnet.description: A valid subnet to use to setup the access point

gateway.description: The default gateway to use for routing / natting

iot.agile.Storage.Driver.description:
A Driver component is in charge of data storage and
retrieval on a specific implementation.
It may be a local database or an online services via APIs

return.description: Return the Id of the created record

Find.description: Search for a set of records by criterias

Status.description: Indicate the overall status of the Driver.

Error.description: Indicates if an error occured. May be reset once notified.

uri.description:
A parsable connection string composed of key value
indicated by `=` symbol, separated with `;`.
If value contains a separator (`=` or `;`) it must be escaped with a backslash.
This may be exposed to the users with a proper UI to allow insertion of personal keys

Logs.description: A system path to read the logs from

iot.agile.Storage.DriverManager.description:
The DriverManager component is in charge for handling the status
of different Drivers available in the system.

driver.description: The driver instance to be added

enable.description:
Specify if the Driver should be enabled and
immediately available

Remove.description:
Remove (and implicitly disable) a driver reference
instance

Status.description: Query a Driver to report the current status.

logs.description: A system path where to read the Driver logs

iot.agile.Storage.description:
The Storage component offer an abstraction for Devices to store and fetch data
in a generic way.
Write operations happens on all the enabled Drivers;
Failure of a single Driver doesn't make faile the whole write but only reported
Read operations work on a default driver, if specified, which acts as preferred source.
In case default is not available or fails, read will be executed in cascade on
the enabled Driver. If none replies the operation fails.

return.description: Return the Id of the created record

Find.description: Search for a set of records by criterias

DeviceOverview.description: An overview of a device a protocol knows about

id.description: Protocol level id used to identify and access the device

duration.description:
The duration in seconds the discovery process will last before
it should be stopped

id.description: the internal code identifying the protocol

ProtocolProfile.description:
A Protocol set of settings that translate human readable properties
to actual Protocol implementation details.

For example, the user request the temperature value over a BLE connected
device and the Protocol receive all the specific informations (like
services and characteristics ids) to enable the data reading.

ProtocolStatus.description:
Identify a status of the Protocol, indicating if operational (AVAILABLE) or
if for some reason further user-side checks are required.

DeviceDefinition.description: A device definition that contains informations describing the current device

path.description: DBus specific path to reach the object instance

DeviceStream.description: A stream containing a set of definitions of device components, like sensors

DeviceStreamChannel.description: A channel contains the definition of a component like a sensor

DeviceId.description: The Agile Id for the device

ComponentId.description: The component Id for the device, like the sensor name

Format.description: A format description to read the data value

LastUpdate.description: A UNIX timestamp rapresenting the last update of a record

Criteria.description:
A key-value series of field-value to query for.
- Use `*` to indicate a fuzzy search
- Use an Array to indicate an IN like query

OrderBy.description: A key-value series of field-value to order the result for.

Limit.description: The limit of records founds to return

Offset.description: The position for the first record to take from the list of results
